assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: SOFT99corporation manufactures and sells chemical products for auto and home care in Japan and internationally. The company offers car care products, including body care products, such as car coating, waxing, cleaning, shampoo, and car wash tools; coating agents and cleaning products for exterior parts; and glass and mirror care products, which include water repellents, wipers, and cleaning and anti-fog products; and care products for tires, wheels, seats, and car interior. It also provides brush, spray, and other paint products; and car repair tools, such as putty, compound, sandpaper, adhesives and tapes, rust, muffler, rubber and unpainted plastic, radiator, belt, wipers, cleaning, and degreasing agents and other products. In addition, the company offers car maintenance and accessories products, including wiper rubbers and blades; tire chains and TPMS; maintenance chemicals, radiators, and oil related products for engine bay; and fragrances and deodorants, seat cushions and covers, handle covers, cushions, and other products. Further, it provides household products, such as cleaning and repair products used in kitchens, bathrooms, leather, interior, and other applications, as well as coating and cleaning products for electronics; cleaning and other products used for windows; and coating agents, rust removers, and other products. Additionally, the company offers glasses care products, including cleaners and anti-fog products, as well as related products. SOFT99corporation was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
